il.co.server

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • il.co.server.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller is a class that manage the massages transfer between the user application and the plane application Along with that the controller also transfer specific massages about the plane information to the mySQL database.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    v5.0
    Author:
    Shmulik Melamed, Lital Motola
